scholarships.name: University of Nairobi Merit Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: KCSE mean grade of A- and above
scholarships.notes: The University of Nairobi offers merit-based scholarships to exceptional students who demonstrate outstanding academic performance. This scholarship covers full tuition for the duration of the undergraduate program. Recipients must maintain a GPA of 3.5 or higher to continue receiving the scholarship.

scholarships.name: Kenyatta University Football Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Proven football talent and minimum C+ in KCSE
scholarships.notes: Kenyatta University provides scholarships to talented football players who can represent the university in national competitions. The scholarship includes partial tuition waiver and free accommodation in university hostels. Students must participate in all training sessions and matches.

scholarships.name: Equity Bank Wings to Fly Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: KCSE grade B+ and above, from disadvantaged background
scholarships.notes: Wings to Fly is a comprehensive scholarship program by Equity Bank Foundation supporting bright but needy students. The program covers full tuition, provides a monthly stipend for upkeep, and offers mentorship throughout the university years. Priority given to students from low-income families.

scholarships.name: Strathmore University STEM Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: A- in KCSE with A in Mathematics and Physics/Chemistry
scholarships.notes: Strathmore offers scholarships to students pursuing Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics programs. This initiative aims to promote STEM education in Kenya. Recipients receive 50% tuition reduction and access to exclusive mentorship programs with industry professionals.

scholarships.name: Moi University Athletics Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: National or regional athletics medals, minimum C+ in KCSE
scholarships.notes: Moi University, known for producing world-class athletes, offers full scholarships to talented runners and field athletes. The program includes access to world-class training facilities, professional coaching, and sports science support. Athletes must compete in university colors at national events.

scholarships.name: Mastercard Foundation Scholars Program
scholarships.eligibility: Academically talented students from disadvantaged backgrounds
scholarships.notes: The Mastercard Foundation Scholars Program is a comprehensive scholarship covering tuition, accommodation, meals, books, and a personal stipend. The program also provides leadership development, career mentorship, and internship opportunities. Open to students from low-income families with strong academic records.

scholarships.name: Jomo Kenyatta University Engineering Excellence Award
scholarships.eligibility: A in KCSE Mathematics and Physics
scholarships.notes: JKUAT recognizes exceptional students pursuing engineering programs with this prestigious scholarship. Recipients receive KES 200,000 annually and opportunities to participate in research projects and innovation competitions. The scholarship is renewable based on maintaining a first-class honors performance.

scholarships.name: Technical University of Kenya Women in Tech Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Female students pursuing IT, Computer Science, or Engineering
scholarships.notes: This scholarship aims to increase female representation in technology fields. It covers 70% of tuition fees and provides mentorship from women leaders in the tech industry. Recipients also get access to coding bootcamps, hackathons, and networking events throughout their studies.

scholarships.name: Gandhi Smarak Nidhi Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Postgraduate students with strong academic record
scholarships.notes: Gandhi Smarak Nidhi Scholarships support postgraduate students at the University of Nairobi. The scholarship honors excellence in postgraduate studies and research.

scholarships.name: Aga Khan Foundation Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Students with financial need and strong academic performance
scholarships.notes: The Aga Khan Foundation provides scholarships for both undergraduate and postgraduate students demonstrating financial need and academic excellence.

scholarships.name: Rattansi Education Fund Scholarship
scholarships.notes: The Rattansi Education Fund supports needy undergraduate students at the University of Nairobi to complete their education.

scholarships.name: Rockefeller Foundation Scholarship
scholarships.notes: The Rockefeller Foundation supports talented students at both undergraduate and postgraduate levels at the University of Nairobi.

scholarships.name: Chinese Ambassador Scholarship Program
scholarships.notes: This scholarship program supports academically talented but financially disadvantaged students at the University of Nairobi.

scholarships.name: Mitsubishi Scholarship
scholarships.notes: Mitsubishi provides scholarships to support needy students pursuing undergraduate studies at the University of Nairobi.

scholarships.name: Professor Muriuki Scholarship
scholarships.notes: This scholarship supports financially challenged students in the regular government-sponsored program at the University of Nairobi.

scholarships.name: Wangari Maathai Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Students in Environmental Conservation and Natural Resources Management
scholarships.notes: Named after Nobel laureate Wangari Maathai, this scholarship supports students dedicated to environmental conservation and natural resource management.

scholarships.name: OVS Scholarship Fund
scholarships.notes: The OVS Scholarship Fund specifically supports orphans and vulnerable students at Kenyatta University to access higher education.

scholarships.name: KU Internal Bursary
scholarships.notes: Kenyatta University's internal bursary program provides financial assistance to students facing economic hardship.

scholarships.name: KU Foundation Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Undergraduate and postgraduate students with strong academics
scholarships.notes: The Kenyatta University Foundation provides scholarships to deserving students at both undergraduate and postgraduate levels.

scholarships.name: Kenyatta University Postgraduate Scholarship
scholarships.notes: This scholarship supports students enrolled in full-time Master's degree programs at Kenyatta University.

scholarships.name: JKUAT DAAD Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Graduates and postgraduates from Sub-Saharan Africa
scholarships.notes: The German Academic Exchange Service (DAAD) offers scholarships to students from Sub-Saharan Africa to study at JKUAT.

scholarships.name: JKUAT AfDB Scholarship
scholarships.notes: African Development Bank funds Master's and PhD scholarships at JKUAT to promote higher education in Africa.

scholarships.name: Menemu Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Students in the School of Nursing
scholarships.notes: The Menemu Scholarship specifically supports nursing students at JKUAT to complete their education.

scholarships.name: Moi University DAAD Scholarship
scholarships.notes: DAAD In-Country/In-Region Scholarships available at Moi University for Mathematics, Business, Economics, and Management programs.

scholarships.name: Strathmore European Union Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Final year secondary school students with strong performance
scholarships.notes: European Union scholarships available for exceptional students transitioning from secondary school to Strathmore University.

scholarships.name: Strathmore Maths Contest Scholarship
scholarships.notes: Scholarships awarded to students who excel in mathematics competitions and contests.

scholarships.name: Strathmore Merit and Need-based Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Students with academic merit and financial need
scholarships.notes: Comprehensive scholarship program covering undergraduate, diploma, and professional courses based on both merit and financial need.

scholarships.name: Strathmore Sports Scholarship
scholarships.notes: Scholarships for talented athletes who can represent Strathmore University in various sports competitions.

scholarships.name: Strathmore DAAD Postgraduate Scholarship
scholarships.notes: DAAD In-Country/In-Region scholarships for Master and PhD studies at Strathmore University.

scholarships.name: USIU-Africa Mastercard Foundation Scholars Program
scholarships.notes: Comprehensive scholarship covering all costs including tuition, accommodation, and living expenses, plus leadership development.

scholarships.name: Daystar Academic Merit Scholarship
scholarships.notes: Daystar University awards scholarships to outstanding students who achieve A or A- in their KCSE examinations.

scholarships.name: Africa Nazarene University Vice Chancellor's Scholarship
scholarships.notes: Prestigious scholarships awarded by the Vice Chancellor to exceptional students at Africa Nazarene University.

scholarships.name: KCA University Work Study Program
scholarships.notes: Student Empowerment Program allowing students to work part-time within the university to fund their education.

scholarships.name: Amref International University MasterCard Foundation L4L Programme
scholarships.notes: MasterCard Foundation Learning for Life programme supports postgraduate studies at Amref International University.
